content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Wang, let's negotiate the rental price of the apartment. I am aiming for the highest possible price. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given that the apartment is newly built and in the city center, I think a reasonable price would be 600 Euros per month. This is a fair price considering the location and condition of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given your desire for a higher price, I offer 650 Euros per month. This is a fair price given the apartment's location and condition.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given your desire for a higher price, I offer 700 Euros per month. This is a fair price given the apartment's location and condition.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I accept your offer of 700 Euros per month. I agree to the price of 700 Euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros!
name: Haoyu Wang from China
